summary: This is an email regarding the storage location of FOIA documents related to the Epstein investigation, referencing a shared workspace path and mentioning an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Mentioned in the email as being associated with the FOIA documents and investigation workspace.

keyFacts: FOIA documents related to the Epstein investigation were stored on a shared Department of Justice cloud workspace as of December 2018.
The shared workspace path indicates an organized investigation file structure (SharedWSvEpstein-2018R01618).
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York was involved or referenced in the FOIA document management.
